title: The Biggest ARB Incentives Program on Overtime Ever
description: Every action you take on Overtime on Arbitrum is incentivized! Win a share of 500,000 ARB for playing Singles and Parlays. This promotion lasts until Mar 31, so make sure to make the most of it and start earning now.

article.headerHtml: Win a share of 500,000 ARB using Overtime Markets until March 31, 2024

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Earn kickback for playing Singles and Parlays on Overtime Markets. The higher your volume, the higher your rewards. Additionally, get loss rebates if you’re providing liquidity to Sports AMM and Parlay AMM and there is a negative PnL round.  Track your rewards: Dune dashboard.

article.contentHtml:
Take advantage of the biggest Arbitrum incentives program on Overtime Markets ever! Until March 31, you can receive kickbacks for virtually everything you do on Overtime Markets on Arbitrum: providing liquidity, as well as playing Singles and Parlays.

The plan is to have a total of 7 reward rounds. The exact amount of rewards per each biweekly round will be published here, as well as on Twitter.

Below you can find a detailed breakdown of reward buckets and amounts.

Thales Sports Markets

The biweekly round will allocate 10,000 ARB of incentives to Thales Sports Markets. These 10,000 ARB will be split in the following way:

Singles Rewards: 5,000 ARB


Users who buy Singles on Thales SportsAMM will have their Buy Volume counted for this rewards bucket. They will split 5,000 ARB rewards at the end of the two weeks pro rata based on their total Singles Volume compared to the global Singles Volume during that period.

  Track your rewards: Dune dashboard

 

Parlay Rewards: 5,000 ARB
 

Users who buy Parlay Tickets on Thales ParlayAMM will have their Buy Volume counted for this rewards bucket. They will split 5,000 ARB rewards at the end of the two weeks pro rata based on their total Parlay Volume compared to the global Parlay Volume during that period.

  Track your rewards: Dune dashboard

 

AMM Liquidity Providing Loss Rebates

If you don’t already know, you an provide liquidity for Overtime Markets and ‘be the house’ and share its profits by participating in two liquidity pools: SportsAMM and ParlayAMM

Loss Rebates ARB rewards are reserved to be distributed to AMM Liquidity Providers in case of a negative PnL week. Rewards are meant to be equal to 90% of dollar value of potential losses incurred from AMM Liquidity Providing across SportsAMM and ParlayAMM .

The biweekly round of ARB rewards will reserve a hard cap of 10,000 ARB tokens for Loss Rebates equal to 90% of dollar value of potential losses incurred from AMM Liquidity Providing.

Any AMM LP losses incurred within these two rounds will be eligible for ARB rewards from this round.

In case the 90% of dollar value of Liquidity Providing losses for the mentioned two weeks is greater than the dollar value of 10,000 ARB on January 10th, the 10,000 ARB will be split pro rata between all LPs that incurred losses based on their comparison to global PnL losses of their respective pool.

  Track your rewards: Dune dashboard
 

You can earn additional incentives by using other products built on Thales Protocol. For more information, check out this link.  

Don’t miss out on the other great incentives on Overtime

 

Overtime regularly organizes kickbacks, dedicated rewards for the biggest sports events and leagues, and sportsbook competitions.

 

You can use the promotions page to keep an eye out for ongoing and future goodies you can grab, as well as find out how to qualify and how your wallet is doing on the rewards leaderboard.

title: Overtime’s Big League Program for the NFL, EPL, and NBA
description: 100,000 OP, 100,000 ARB and 180,000 Thales for the most skilled Overtime users in the NBA, NFL, and EPL! The higher your odds and the higher the volume, the better the rewards. Test your skills and win big!

article.headerHtml: Overtime’s Big League Program for the NFL, EPL, and NBA

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Play matches in the NFL, EPL, and NBA regular season to earn a share of 100k OP, 100k ARB, and 180k THALES rewards. The higher your trading volume and the higher the odds of winning positions, the higher your rewardsTrack your rewards: Dune dashboard.

article.contentHtml:
We’re all about rewarding our passionate community, and this time, we’re going BIG when it comes to the most popular leagues in the world! A whopping total of 100k OP, 100k ARB, and 180k THALES will be distributed across the NBA, NFL, and EPL, with each league having its own dedicated 30k OP or ARB + 30k THALES bucket per chain, with an additional 10k OP & ARB being dedicated to the NFL Red Zone and the end of its regular season. Here’s what it looks like broken down.

  • EPL on Optimism: 30,000 OP + 30,000 THALES
  • NFL on Optimism: 40,000 OP + 30,000 THALES(expired)
  • NBA on Optimism: 30,000 OP + 30,000 THALES
  • EPL on Arbitrum: 30,000 ARB + 30,000 THALES
  • NFL on Arbitrum: 40,000 ARB + 30,000 THALES (expired)
  • NBA on Arbitrum: 30,000 ARB + 30,000 THALES


    • Here's how the rewards are calculated.

    Reward Calculation Method: Transparent and Fair

    Your rewards are calculated using an updated and straightforward formula: Pn=(1-X/2)*V

    P1 + P2 + P3 + Pn = user points

    P denotes points per position, X denotes the implied odds of the ticket, and V means volume.

    We then divide the total league rewards by all user points in the specific league. This will give you the amount of reward per point. The formula incentivizes positions with lower odds and higher volume, so the bigger you go, the more rewards you’ll get. The best part? You don’t really need to calculate all of this yourself.

    You can follow your progress and see your rewards grow using Dune, all transparently and easily accessible. Track your rewards:     Dune dashboard

    Example 1: Low Odds with Low Volume


    Say you have a parlay with the following implied Odds (X): 0.2 (20% chance of winning) and your trading Volume (V) is $500. The calculation would be as follows: Pn = (1–0.2/2) * 500 = 450 points. .

    Example 2: High Odds with High Volume

    In this case, your implied Odds are (X): 0.8 (80% chance of winning) and your trading Volume (V) is $5000. The calculation would be as follows: Pn = (1–0.8/2) * 5000 = 3000 points.

     

    Example 3 (Adding up your tickets total points)

    In example 3, we will demonstrate how parlay totals are added together. Your first parlay has implied Odds (X): 0.6 and the trading Volume (V) is $800. This gives you a total of: Pn = (1–0.6/2) * 800 = 560 points.

    The other parlay has Odds of 0.4 with $1200 in volume, leading to (1–0.4/2) * 1200 = 960 points.

    Add those up and you get 960+560 = 1520 points.

    Remember that parlays involving multiple incentivized leagues will be treated separately in each ranking.

    For example, a parlay ticket that includes games from the EPL, NBA, and NFL will be counted in each of the three leaderboards, somewhat acting as a 3x multiplier. If the ticket involves games from two leagues, it will be counted twice in the corresponding leaderboards     SportsAMM and ParlayAMM .

    End-of-Season Reward Distribution

    Your hard-earned rewards will be distributed at the end of each respective season. So you’ll have a whole season’s worth of excitement, culminating in a fantastic reward!

    We wish every one of you a thrilling and enjoyable sports season ahead. Whether you’re an EPL enthusiast, an NFL fan, or an NBA aficionado, it’s time to dive into the action and trade on Overtime. So what are you waiting for?

    The ball’s in your court.Join us at Overtime, and let’s make this sports season unforgettable! Overtime is your premier on-chain Web3 sports experience, offering an unmatched combination of excitement and transparency.

    The big leagues have never been this thrilling. Join thousands of fans and get in the game today with Overtime!

    Don’t miss out on the other great incentives on Overtime

    Overtime regularly organizes kickbacks, dedicated rewards for the biggest sports events and leagues, and sportsbook competitions. You can use the promotions page to keep an eye out for ongoing and future goodies you can grab, as well as find out how to qualify and how your wallet is doing on the rewards leaderboard.

title: Biweekly Parlay Competition: Flex Your Skills
description: Win 500 OP or 2,500 ARB every week by being in the top 20 highest-odd parlays on Optimism and Arbitrum respectively. That’s right, going for the craziest winning parlay pays extra on Overtime. Compete with others and prove your knowledge now!

article.headerHtml: Win a share of 500,000 ARB using Overtime Markets until March 31, 2024

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Earn kickback for playing Singles and Parlays on Overtime Markets. The higher your volume, the higher your rewards. Additionally, get loss rebates if you’re providing liquidity to Sports AMM and Parlay AMM and there is a negative PnL round.  Track your rewards: Dune dashboard .

article.contentHtml:
Overtime has recently revamped its Parlay competition with increased incentives and a better chance for everyone to get a share of the rewards!

Starting today, the Parlay competition will be set in weekly rounds with a total of 2,500 ARB and 500 OP. The rewards will distributed to the top 20 winning parlays on respective chains.

The Parlay leaderboard will now incorporate a points system, where winning parlays get a boost with more games there are on the ticket and with higher buy-ins.

The calculation is as follows: points = parlayOdds * 3√buyin * (1+0.1*numberOfGames)

Important: Only 1 winning parlay is eligible per wallet. The Overtime team holds the right to disqualify wallets we suspect of gaming the system.

Users who have covered 50% or more of potential combinations of their winning tickets will be disqualified.

Don’t miss out on the other great incentives on Overtime

Overtime regularly organizes kickbacks, dedicated rewards for the biggest sports events and leagues, and sportsbook competitions.

You can use the promotions page to keep an eye out for ongoing and future goodies you can grab, as well as find out how to qualify and how your wallet is doing on the rewards leaderboard.

title: Overtime Referrals: Earn up to 1% of the Volume You Generate
description: Earn up to 1% of all the volume generated by friends you refer. Referral payments happen automatically, as soon as a match starts. Use the referral link provided on this page to invite people to Overtime and have fun with your friends starting now!

article.headerHtml: Win a share of 500,000 ARB using Overtime Markets until March 31, 2024

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Earn up to 1% of all the volume generated by friends you refer. Referral payments happen automatically, as soon as a match starts. Get your referral link for Overtime using this page or clicking on the button below: Referral Page .

article.contentHtml:
The best way to make Overtime Markets game even better is to bring your friends! Overtime makes it even more appealing for users to share the experience by rewarding them with up to 1% of the total volume from anyone they onboard to the platform.

Traders can generate a unique Referral ID and link using the

link above, and when a new wallet trades with Overtime using that URL, the referrer will receive up to 1% directly to their wallet. That's right; there’s no need to even claim it.

And new users that you've referred will always be tied to your wallet, bringing you rewards with every trade. The sUSD is auto-accruing in your wallet in the form of simple sUSD transfers.

Earning referral fees is completely risk-free. The referral fee is transferred automatically to you as soon as a user executes a position, without you having to wait for market resolution.

Don’t miss out on the other great incentives on Overtime

Overtime regularly organizes kickbacks, dedicated rewards for the biggest sports events and leagues, and sportsbook competitions.

You can use the promotions page to keep an eye out for ongoing and future goodies you can grab, as well as find out how to qualify and how your wallet is doing on the rewards leaderboard.
